name: competitive-programming-helper
description: Makes judging, compiling, and downloading problems for competitve programming easy.

competitive-programming-helper.saveLocat.description: Location where generated .tcs and .bin files will be saved. Leave empty to save the file in the source file directory. Use this to clean up your folders.

competitive-programming-helper.compilati.title: Compilation flags for .c files
competitive-programming-helper.compilati.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to gcc ( for C) while compiling your file. Example '-O2 -Wall'

competitive-programming-helper.compilati.title: Compilation flags for .cpp files
competitive-programming-helper.compilati.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to g++ ( for C++ ) while compiling your file. Example '-Wmaybe-uninitialized -std=c++14'

competitive-programming-helper.compilati.title: Compilation flags for .py files
competitive-programming-helper.compilati.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to python3 ( for Python ) while interpreting your file. Example '-Wignore -u'

competitive-programming-helper.firstTime.title: Show welcome message
competitive-programming-helper.firstTime.description: A welcome message is shown when you run a testcase for the first time.
